evaluation.tip: Use complete words and share a bit more about how you're feeling so your professor can better understand and help you.

conversation_context.content: Hey there! I just finished grading those quizzes and... honestly, I'm a bit worried about you.

Hey, I hear you saying “oki,” but I’m still worried. Those last two quizzes—35 on Data Structures and 28 on Algorithms—aren’t just little oopsies; they’re pulling you down to about a 45 overall, and the midterm’s in two weeks. I’m not trying to stress you out more, but I need to know: what’s been going on outside of class that’s making CS feel impossible right now?
